name: Call of Crime the City Mafia
name_original: Call of Crime the City Mafia
description:
Call of Crime the City Mafia

A lot of interesting criminal missions!

Call of Crime the City Mafia is one of the best shooting games, felony simulator and gangster games available!

The mafia world is a dangerous place and you need to know how to look after yourselfWant to build a Criminal Empire and crush your rivals?
Get ready to show everyone who’s boss by fighting in open world real action game. Rule the streets in this action-packed game.

The action in this crime simulator 3D game revolves around shooting and killing your enemies.

It is Free to Download and Play.

Key features:

=> Amazing township environment
=> Crime Mafia and mob wars
=> Realistic special effects
=> Best crime simulator game feeling ever!!
=> open world criminal gunfights
